types:type.name: deleteEx
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type deleteEx = Array<{| deleteActionName: String |}> {"example": "[{\\\"deleteActionName\\\":\\\"Delete Prev Employees\\\"}]"}

types:type.name: exportSFDCEx
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type exportSFDCEx = Array<{| sfdcObject: String, exportName: String|}> {"example": "[{\\\"sfdcObject\\\":\\\"AnaplanLocation__c\\\",\\\"exportName\\\":\\\"SYS04 Location Details from Locations.csv\\\"}]"}

types:type.name: dataToSFDCEx
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type dataToSFDCEx = Array<{| Code__c: String, Name: String, Department__c: String, Country__c: String, Region__c: String, salary__c: String|}> {"example": "[{\\\"Code__c\\\":\\\"024\\\",\\\"Name\\\":\\\"Josphine Huffer\\\",\\\"Department__c\\\":\\\"Sales\\\",\\\"Country__c\\\":\\\"Brazil\\\",\\\"Region__c\\\":\\\"Americas\\\",\\\"salary__c\\\":\\\"58000\\\"},{\\\"Code__c\\\":\\\"026\\\",\\\"Name\\\":\\\"Theda Dickerson\\\",\\\"Department__c\\\":\\\"Sales\\\",\\\"Country__c\\\":\\\"New Zealand\\\",\\\"Region__c\\\":\\\"Asia Pacific\\\",\\\"salary__c\\\":\\\"45000\\\"}]"}

types:type.name: uploadFileSfdc
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type uploadFileSfdc = Array<{| sfdcObject: String, fileName: String, fileChunkSize: Number {"typeId": "int"}|}> {"example": "[{\\\"sfdcObject\\\":\\\"AnaplanLocation__c\\\",\\\"fileName\\\":\\\"SYS04 Location Details from Locations.csv\\\",\\\"fileChunkSize\\\":5}]"}

types:type.name: exportDescribeEx
